description: This source file defines the TokenComparison class, which extends Token and represents comparison tokens used within expression parsing, including an enumeration of comparison operators and associated methods.

classes.name: TokenComparison
classes.description: A specialized Token subclass representing comparison operators within expressions. Includes an enum for comparison types and methods for retrieving comparison info.

classes.name: TokenComparison.Comparison
classes.description: Enum for various comparison operators, each with a string description and a static method to find an enum value based on string description.

methods.name: TokenComparison
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the TokenComparison with token type and value, setting the corresponding comparison enum.

methods.name: getComparison
methods.description: Returns the Comparison enum representing the comparison operator of this token.

methods.name: isComparison
methods.description: Overrides the method to indicate that this token represents a comparison.

methods.name: isNegateComparison
methods.description: Indicates whether the comparison is a negation (specifically '!' operator).
